info.title: Orkut
info.description: Build OpenSocial-based applications for orkut's world-wide user base.

parameters.name: activityId
parameters.description: ID of the activity to remove.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: ID of the user to be removed from the activity.

delete.description: Excludes an element from the ACL of the activity. The value "me" is valid for the parameter userId and means the authenticated user.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: The ID of the user whose activities will be listed. Can be me to refer to the viewer (i.e. the authenticated user).

parameters.name: collection
parameters.description:
The collection of activities to list. 
1. "stream", which shows activities from the user's friends. Applications can only view the stream of the authenticated user.
2. "all", which shows activities created by the user that are visible to the authenticated user.
3. "scraps", which shows the user's scrapbook. Access controls apply, so the authenticated user will see public scraps, scraps to all friends if he or she is a friend of the target user, and private scraps if he or she is in the Access control list
for the scrap.

parameters.name: hl
parameters.description: Specifies the interface language (host language) of your user interface.

parameters.name: maxResults
parameters.description: The maximum number of activities to include in the response. (integer, 1-100)

parameters.name: pageToken
parameters.description: A continuation token that allows pagination.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Selector specifying which fields to include in a partial response.

parameters.name: activityId
parameters.description: ID of the activity to remove.

delete.description: Deletes an existing activity, if the access controls allow it. Currently the authenticated user is only allowed to delete their own activities.

parameters.name: activityId
parameters.description: ID of the activity to get the visibility.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Selector specifying which fields to include in a partial response.

get.description: Gets the visibility of an existing activity.

parameters.name: Content-Type
parameters.description: Specifies Content Type.

put.description: Updates the visibility of an existing activity.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: The id of the user whose badges will be listed. Can be me to refer to caller.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Selector specifying which fields to include in a partial response.

get.description: Retrieves the list of visible badges of a user.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: The ID of the user whose badges will be listed. Can be me to refer to caller.

parameters.name: badgeId
parameters.description: The ID of the badge that will be retrieved.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Selector specifying which fields to include in a partial response.

get.description: Retrieves a badge from a user.

parameters.name: activityId
parameters.description: The ID of the activity containing the comments.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Selector specifying which fields to include in a partial response.

parameters.name: hl
parameters.description: Specifies the interface language (host language) of your user interface.

parameters.name: maxResults
parameters.description: The maximum number of activities to include in the response. (integer, 1+)

parameters.name: orderBy
parameters.description: Sort search results.

parameters.name: pageToken
parameters.description: A continuation token that allows pagination.

get.description: Retrieves a list of comments, possibly filtered.

parameters.name: Content-Type
parameters.description: Specifies Content Type.

post.description: Inserts a new comment to an activity.

parameters.name: commentId
parameters.description: ID of the comment to get.

parameters.name: hl
parameters.description: Specifies the interface language (host language) of your user interface.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Selector specifying which fields to include in a partial response.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: The ID of the user whose counters will be listed.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Selector specifying which fields to include in a partial response.

get.description: Retrieves the counters of an user.
